ComicInfo.Summary:
HeNRI developed the world's first liquid metal atomic weapon. Now, like it or not, Julie Martin is wearing that metal and is forced to run to keep HeNRI from continuing their deadly development! With no allies but a delusional sister and a park ranger to help her, Julie must find a way to become something she's never been before - brave!
Jack and Ivy arrive at the hackers home and find his corpse in a most unsual state.
Julie reviews her footage of the incident for answers and wonders whats happening to her.
Dillon goes to HeNRI asking questions about his missing girl-friend and eventually gets a matter-of-fact answer of she might be dead and no body to bury even.
Julie's truck is stopped by troops and when one tries to touch her the suit shocks him hard. Julie experiences a scene from Annie's life during the resulting blackout. Coming too shes is now in real trouble.
